termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.description: Terms and conditions for using Detect AI

acceptance.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Detect AI, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any of these terms, please do not use the service.

serviceDescription.heading: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.intro: Detect AI is a system for disease detection using artificial intelligence. The service includes:
items: Analysis of medical images using artificial intelligence
Provision of medical reports and recommendations
Storage and organization of medical history
Access to analysis results at any time

registration.heading: 3. Registration and Account
registration.intro: To use the service, you must:
items: Maintain the confidentiality of your password
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

allowed.title: 4.1 Permitted Use
items: Use the service for personal medical purposes
Store your medical images and reports
Share reports with your doctor if needed

prohibited.title: 4.2 Prohibited Use
items: Use the service for illegal purposes
Upload images without consent from the patient
Attempt to access other users' data
Reverse engineer or modify the service

medicalDisclaimer.heading: 5. Medical Disclaimer
medicalDisclaimer.content: Detect AI is an analytical tool and not a substitute for professional medical advice. All results must be reviewed and confirmed by a qualified healthcare professional. Detect AI is not responsible for any medical decisions made based on the analysis results.

limitation.heading: 6. Limitation of Liability
items: Detect AI is provided 'as is' without warranties
We are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from service usage
We do not guarantee 100% accuracy of analysis results

changes.heading: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of changes.

contact.heading: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us at support@detect-ai.com

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.description: How we protect your data and privacy at Detect AI

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Detect AI, we are committed to protecting your privacy and the security of your personal and medical information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

dataUsage.heading: 3. How We Use Your Data
items: To provide and improve our services
To enhance security and detect fraud

dataProtection.heading: 4. Data Protection
measures: Encryption of all data in transit and at rest
Limited access to personal data (authorized personnel only)
Compliance with international data protection standards
Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures

dataSecurity.heading: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: While we implement strong security measures, no system is completely secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security of your data.

thirdParty.heading: 6. Third Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services for hosting, analytics, and payment processing. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your data.

userRights.heading: 7. Your Rights
items: Request deletion of your data (where applicable)
Object to certain types of processing

cookies.heading: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve user experience, analyze usage, and enhance security. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

policyChanges.heading: 9. Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes and update the "Last updated" date.

contact.heading: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at support@detect-ai.com
